title: Why being born without arms is just about the best thing that's ever happened to me
content: at 11:34am PSTBeing born without arms might be the single greatest thing that has happened to me, apart from my salvation. A post shared by Daniel Ritchie (@danielpritchie) on Oct 6, 2017 at 9:33am PDT2. A post shared by Daniel Ritchie (@danielpritchie) on Aug 17, 2017 at 6:42pm PDT3. I was starting to see the ways that God was answering my prayers – even in ways I did not expect. A post shared by Daniel Ritchie (@danielpritchie) on Feb 23, 2018 at 11:01am PST4.    Source: Fox News  June 02, 2018 07:52 UTC
